errors.error_description: The URL for the logo image is incorrect, pointing to 'logo.svg' instead of 'logo_wide.svg', which results in a broken image link.
correction_candidates: Remove the logo image tag from the README.

errors.error_description: The installation instructions incorrectly include a preliminary step to install a non-existent package `rlberry-core`. This command will fail as the package is not on PyPI.
correction_candidates: Change `pip install rlberry-core` to `pip install rlberry[core]`.
Remove the line `pip install rlberry-core` and its preceding text.
Combine the two commands into `pip install rlberry-core rlberry`.
errors.golden_answer: Remove the line `pip install rlberry-core` and its preceding text.
